attributes.action: Improve drainage of cemeteries in Coventry
attributes.background:
St Pauls and Lenton Lane cemeteries in Coventry are suffering flooding and in a poor state of disrepair. Coventry Council needs to supply more funding to improve drainage and improve upkeep of graves and grounds.

This is disrespectful to those at rest there and traumatising for families visiting.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local cemeteries are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://www.coventry.gov.uk/petitions
